title: Into the Heart of the Abyss
description: Rhas-Khan is the god of the abyss and Eilian is his lover. The need for pain with their pleasure has Eilian asking Rhas-Khan for a whipping while bound with an extra surprise of Rhas-Khan’s choosing to further spice the session up. Because of the immense love Rhas-Khan has for Eilian, he decides to take the session one step further to please his lover, giving Eilian something he’s often asked for that ultimately leaves them both sated and even deeper in love with each other.
author: I.D. Locke
